ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: I have a question about eqgame.exe
ygData.msgSnippet: What version of directx are you using?  I asked Sony and they still do not support  DirectX 9.  They told me I should continue to use DX 8.1 and they don t
ygData.messageBody: What version of directx are you using?  I asked Sony and they still do not support  DirectX 9.  They told me I should continue to use DX 8.1 and they don't know when DX 9 will be testedfor the use with the game.  Teh last time i Had a problem with that type of isuue was after a patch and I had it a few times when I was using Win xp.  Wjen ii switched back to using Win ME i no longer got problems like that.  Now the lonly problem I have is everytime i  log onto the game I have to change my languae back to common.
